name: Dot Trail Adventure
description:
Collect the Dots without falling into oblivion! Move platforms with speed and skill to guide your character in the right direction. Seems simple, but each level has new challenges in store!

Features:
Unique Gameplay: Your character moves automatically, but you must act fast to craft its path and collect all the Dots.
Countless Cool Characters: Jump into the adventure as a Sheep, Robot or even a God!
Overcome Obstacles: Dodge the Bombs, run from Reapers and avoid all kinds of dangers.
Bag Some Boosts: Collect Hearts, Diamonds and Gifts to help you out along the way.
